title: Mage Hand
content: e Hand is actually capable of providing exceptional support with a bit of planning and mindfulness. Splitting item stacks and dropping items requires no action, so players can pick a spot close to the fight to perch their Mage Hand, and place a selection of individual potions, poisons, grenades, water jugs, fireworks, or the like, and then leave the Mage Hand's side to reduce the risk that it's caught in an enemy AoE.
